channel.title: CVE Feed for ITPison -- OMICARD EDM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ITPison -- OMICARD EDM

item.title: CVE-2022-32964|2024-09-17T03:43:33.094Z -- itpison -- omicard%20edm
item.description: OMICARD EDM’s API function has insufficient validation for user input. An unauthenticated remote attacker can inject arbitrary SQL commands to access, modify, delete database or disrupt service.

item.title: CVE-2022-32963|2024-09-17T03:34:25.684Z -- itpison -- omicard%20edm
item.description: OMICARD EDM’s mail file relay function has a path traversal vulnerability. An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to by-pass authentication and access arbitrary system files.

item.title: CVE-2024-4894|2024-06-11T20:23:58.948Z -- itpison -- omicard%20edm
item.description: ITPison OMICARD EDM fails to properly filter specific URL parameter, allowing unauthenticated remote attackers to modify the parameters and conduct Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) attacks. This vulnerability enables attackers to probe internal network information.

item.title: CVE-2024-4894|2024-08-01T20:55:10.323Z -- itpison -- omicard%20edm
item.description: ITPison OMICARD EDM fails to properly filter specific URL parameter, allowing unauthenticated remote attackers to modify the parameters and conduct Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) attacks. This vulnerability enables attackers to probe internal network information.
